title: Corps de deux
brief_description: A stylish looking short filmed without dialogue in the heart of Melbourne’s CBD. Images of the ‘boys’ on the town are inter-cut with more serious scenes of martial arts that have a dance-like quality. The student filmmaker describes it as ‘a conceptual piece that explores opposing aspects of the male psyche’
